'''Barbara's Avatar Frame Has Arrived! Claim an Exclusive 2023 Reward!''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.7]].

==Event Rewards==
Mysterious Reward Set 1: Barbara's Avatar Frame has arrived!

==Event Duration==

==How to Obtain==
From now until September 30, click the companionship button on the top-right side of the widget or below the #Barbara topic. Once the requisite days are accumulated, Barbara's avatar frame will be unlocked for varying durations!

[https://www.hoyolab.com/article/18458763 >> Widget Usage Guide <<]<br>(Refer to this guide if you don't know how to add widgets)

==Reward Distribution and Time==
* Accumulate 1 Companionship day with Barbara to get her avatar frame for 3 days
* Accumulate 7 Companionship days with Barbara to get her avatar frame for 7 days
* Accumulate 14 Companionship days with Barbara to get her avatar frame for 30 days
* Accumulate 30 Companionship days with Barbara to get her avatar frame permanently

P.S.: Travelers who have already accumulated the aforementioned number of companionship days before July 31 will get their exclusive avatar frame rewards within 7 days.
